files.patch:
@@ -1422,2 +1422,3 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code otherDuration} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code otherDuration} is after
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code otherDuration}
+     *          has a smaller length, zero if they are equal,
+     *          greater than zero if the {@code otherDuration} has a longer length

@@ -1275,2 +1275,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code otherInstant} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code otherInstant} is after
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code otherInstant} is before this instant,
+     *          zero if they are equal, or greater than zero if {@code otherInstant} is after this instant

@@ -1991,3 +1991,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other} is before,
+     *          zero if they are equal, or greater than zero if {@code other} is after

@@ -1810,3 +1810,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other} is before,
+     *          zero if they are equal, or greater than zero if  {@code other} is after

@@ -1534,2 +1534,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other} is before,
+     *          zero if they are equal, or greater than zero if  {@code other} is after

@@ -1805,3 +1805,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is the comparison of the {@code other} instant, if they are not equal,
+     *          and if the {@code other} instant is equal, the comparison of the {@code other} local date-time

@@ -1284,3 +1284,3 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is the comparison of the UTC equivalent {@code other} instant,
+     *          if they are not equal, and if the UTC equivalent {@code other} instant is equal,
+     *          the comparison of the {@code other} local date-time

@@ -1021,3 +1021,2 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other} is before,
+     *          zero if they are equal, or greater than zero if {@code other} is after

@@ -659,2 +659,3 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} ID string is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} ID string is after
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other}'s ID string
+     *          is lexicographically before this ID string, zero if they are equal,
+     *          greater than zero if {@code other}'s ID string is lexicographically after this ID string

@@ -503,3 +503,3 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is the comparison the {@code other} local date-time,
+     *          and the {@code other} chronology, in order, returning the first non-zero result,
+     *          and otherwise returning zero

@@ -572,3 +572,4 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} is after
-
+     * @return the comparator value is the comparison of the {@code other} instant,
+     *          the {@code other} local date-time, the {@code other} zone ID,
+     *          and the {@code other} chronology, in order, returning the first non-zero result,
+     *          and otherwise returning zero

@@ -810,2 +810,5 @@
-     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if the {@code other} ID string is before,
-     *          zero if they are equal, greater than zero if the {@code other} ID string is after
+     * @return the comparator value is less than zero if {@code other}'s ID string
+     *          is lexicographically before this ID string, greater than zero
+     *          if {@code other}'s ID string is lexicographically greater than this ID string;
+     *          otherwise, if the ID strings are equal, the value is zero unless
+     *          the implementation distinguishes instances using additional information
